quotes.quote: Being a role model is a privilege.
Society exists only as a mental concept; in the real world there are only individuals.
Society is based on the assumption that everyone is alike and no one is alive.
Society does not consist of individuals but expresses the sum of interrelations, the relations within which these individuals stand.
An ideal society would be the graveyard of human greatness.
An armed society is a polite society. Manners are good when one may have to back up his acts with his life.
The key to organizing an alternative society is to organize people around what they can do, and more importantly, what they want to do.
In a completely rational society, the best of us would be teachers and the rest of us would have to settle for something else.
In today's society, a teacher is not just a teacher. They're a little bit of everything combined into one.
Society is a like a stew. If you don't stir it up every once in a while then a layer of scum floats to the top.
The society succeeds the day your center goes into a coma and circumference remains functioning. Then you are a robot, a mchine, no more a man.
Society and public opinion can beat the wings off of angels.
Society is one vast conspiracy for carving one into the kind of statue it likes, and then placing it in the most convenient niche it has.
A society that has more justice is a society that needs less charity.
The happiness of society is the end of government.
If society will not admit of woman's free development, then society must be remodeled.
A gender-equal society would be one where the word gender does not exist: where everyone can be themselves.
The most dangerous creation of any society is the man who has nothing to lose.
No society can surely be flourishing and happy, of which the far greater part of the members are poor and miserable.
If a free society cannot help the many who are poor, it cannot save the few who are rich.
Society is like a large piece of frozen water; and skating well is the great art of social life.
Society cares for the individual only so far as he is profitable.
We must stop thinking of the individual and start thinking about what is best for society.
Society is funny, they ask to be yourself, and yet they judge you.
Our society is so sex driven that we forget how to form real connections without the invasion of the body and deluded seeding of the mind.
We won't have a society if we destroy the environment.
Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
In our society, the women who break down barriers are those who ignore limits.
Every human society has its lights and shadows. That's the reality of existence.
Human society sustains itself by transforming nature into garbage.
